cast.name: 乔治·伊斯干达 George Iskandar

trans_title: 劫持比利时航空：我的版本
introduction: Sabena Hijacking – My Version is a powerful, suspenseful docu-drama based on previously undiscovered audio recordings of the former pilot, Captain Reginald Levy. Captain Levy (now deceased) as in command of the Sabena Flight 571 from Brussels, Belgium to Tel Aviv, Israel on 8 May 1972, when it was hijacked by four members from the “Black September”, the armed wing of Fatah or Palestine Liberalization Organisation.
chinese_title: 劫持比利时航空：我的版本
